titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the Engagement: or, The northern subscribers plea opposed to their dissenting neighbors importune animosities against engaging to be true and faithful, &c. Tending to beget a calm compliance in all the consciencious lovers of truth and peace. / Laid together by N.W. a friend to the Common-wealth.
titleStmt.author: N. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Tyton, dwelling at the Three Daggers in Fleetstreet, neer the Temple,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 29. 1649", the 50 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Three Daggers in Fleetstreet, neer the Temple
